attributes.background: Put more aircrafts out and take medical care over there and help save poor innocent lives and a man with over 200 cats and dogs out of there before the deadline on Tuesday when the Taliban really take over and kill thousands of civilians and animals and peoples homes and the country

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same/a similar action: 

Help the people of Afghanistan:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594723

Redeploy UK Forces to Afghanistan to protect the citizens against the Taliban: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594823
